For a movie with an African focus and a Western protagonist, consider "The Last Samurai". The film follows the journey of a samurai ancestor who leads a group of tourists on an adventure in Africa. Starring renowned actors such as Togo Igawa and Tom Cruise, "The Last Samurai" offers a thrilling and cultural experience.

Another option is "Hitch". The film depicts a humorous and suspenseful summer romance between a Hollywood screenwriter and a French detective. With an intriguing plot and a talented cast led by Robinne Lee and Matt Malloy, "Hitch" is a classic that will keep you guessing until the very end.

If you're looking for something more subtle, "You" is a thought-provoking film that explores themes of gun violence, family, and morality. The film features a compelling performance by Bradley Cooper and a compelling narrative that will stay with you long after you watch it.
